metadata.title: CVE-2019-14462 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libmodbus before 3.0.7 and 3.1.x before 3.1.5.There is an out-of-bounds read for the MODBUS_FC_WRITE_MULTIPLE_COILS case,aka VD-1302.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14462` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmodbus5 - 3.1.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmodbus package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.6-1').
